rooms.description: Spacious entrance with eco-friendly materials and natural lighting; integrates a small waiting area for guests.
rooms.vastu: North-East oriented entrance for positive energy.

rooms.description: Open-plan living room connected to the dining area, designed with natural ventilation and ample sunlight; features large windows on the east side.
Adjacent to the living room, featuring sustainable bamboo flooring and energy efficient LED lighting.
Compact, modern kitchen with eco-friendly appliances and built-in storage; includes a small pantry area.
rooms.vastu: South-East corner placement to enhance culinary energy.

rooms.description: Guest bedroom designed with privacy and comfort in mind, equipped with natural ventilation; includes a small balcony.
Second guest bedroom featuring sustainable finishes and energy efficient lighting.
rooms.vastu: West oriented to promote restful sleep.

rooms.description: Largest bedroom featuring an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet; designed with ample natural light.
Modern, water-efficient bathroom attached to master bedroom.
Cozy bedroom with private balcony; uses eco-friendly insulation materials.
Secondary bedroom designed with a built-in storage unit and energy efficient LED lighting.
Luxurious rooftop terrace with sustainable landscaping, solar shading devices, and greenery for eco-friendly living.
A quiet study room integrated into the terrace level with a retractable glass wall to merge indoors and outdoors, designed for concentration.
